body.name: COLOR LIZARD Cellphone Tripod, Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote, Aluminum Alloy Phone Tripod, Foldable Travel Tripod Stand 270° Rotation Compatible with iPhone/Android Camera - White & Rose Gold

features: 3-IN-1 PHONE TRIPOD - The versatile design allows you to use it as a handheld selfie stick, tripod, or desktop phone holder. It is compatible with iPhone 14, 14Pro, 14Pro Max, iPhone 13, 13Pro, 13Pro Max, 12, 12 Pro, 12Pro Max, 11,11Pro, 11Pro Max,11, and all iPhone series, Samsung Galaxy S Series, Note Series, Google Pixel, LG, LG, Nexus, HTC, Google Pixel, Huawei Mate Pro, Xiaomi Redmi and others smart cell phones.

EXTENDABLE & ROTATABLE - The whole stick can be extended to 33 inches to adapt to different shooting purposes. COLOR LIZARD tripod selfie stick has an adjustable 220° rotation bracket, a 270° rotatable phone holder, and a steady tripod for the best viewing angle.

DURABLE MATERIAL - This smartphone selfie stick is made of aluminum alloy, and the surface is anodized. The matte texture of the material allows you to hold it more comfortably, and bring you a reliable and stable shooting experience.

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE - Only 7.7 inches long and weighs 0.37 Lbs. The foldable design allows this phone tripod to be easily stored in your bag or pocket. Suitable for all occasions including travel, camping, picnics, and parties.

BLUETOOTH REMOTE ATTACHED - This selfie stick tripod comes with a magnetic remote control, allowing you to record videos, take photos, and group shooting more conveniently. Perfect for content creators such as TikToker, Youtuber, and Vloggers. Also suitable for travelers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CAPTURE DELIGHT WITH COLORLIZARD Product: Lightweight Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod for Smartphone (Black, White, Pink, Red) Colorlizard aims to bring you a professional shooting experience. This selfie stick with bluetooth remote is perfect for anyone who loves recording their life. It is made of aluminum alloy, which is durable and lightweight. The foldable mini size allows you to carry it anywhere in your pocket or bag. It can be used as a selfie stick or turned into a phone tripod for different shooting needs.

BLUETOOTH REMOTE SHUTTER Magnetic attachedRechargeable with USB cableOne-Click Shooting FLEXIBLE ROTATION 270° Rotated Phone Clip220° Angle AdjustNon-Slip Rubber keeps the phone stable while rotating STURDY PHONE TRIPOD Made with premium aluminum alloyEasy to open/closeStable & NO wobble

ALUMINUM ALLOY POLE Extend up to 33 inchesAnti-scratch matte texturehandheld selfie stick for wide angle filming LIGHTWEIGHT SELFIE STICK Only 0.37 pounds Easily held with one handWon't burden your luggage when traveling PORTABLE POCKET TRIPOD 7.6 inches long Foldable Design Easy to put in pockets and bags
4 COLOR OPTIONS AND ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT- PERFECT FOR VARIOUS OCCASIONS (Vlogging, Camping, Travel, Skateboarding...)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super compact, great for concert bags and light packing! Careful not to pinch your fingers.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This selfie stick/ tripod small and secure feeling, so pretty great and very happy with it overall.1 Con: I wish the remote was either bigger OR came with a loop for a lanyard or strap, as it is VERY small, so be careful when taking it off of the stick because it has flown out of my hands a few times while doing just that.Also, heed my advice and be careful when compressing it back down.As you press the stick back down, the legs begin to go in as well.If you are not careful, you can pinch your hand/fingers something FIERCE dude, and im not eggzagerating (i dont remember how to spell that word and i dont feel like googling it, anyways back to the review)It stands at a modest 33 inches which, with me being 5'2 on a good day stands at around crotch height (wish i had a better body part to relate it to, like my knees, but alas i am short.) and you can angle the head forwards or backwards if you want to get a 'fuller' shot.All in all i like it and will be using it for when i go to concerts and am travelling solo and would like a mini photoshoot with myself. Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I researched a lot of selfie sticks. I wanted a small enough one to go in my purse and one that would be a good quality. So many selfie sticks reviews kept saying they had a problem with the phone tilting, or they didn’t trust the stick the hold their phone completely or that the tripod feature wasn’t stable.You would have thought this one was one of the more top of the line pricing sticks. I’m not worried about my phone dropping, it’s stuck it there. And it’s not tilted once on me. When using the tripod, it’s very stable, to the point I have put it on an uneven surface and it does just fine.The only thing I would have to say bad about is, I got the white and pink one, and that white picks up color from I don’t know what. There is a blue stain I got on it and I have no idea what blue thing it came in contact with it to rub off like that. Haven’t tried to take a magic eraser to it yet, but it’s not a big deal. Don’t really care about a little stain if it means my phone isn’t going to compromised in the selfie stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Inexpensive accessory that does the job. Next time I will buy I sturdier similar item. A little flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I like it a lot to travel it is practical and it fits in your handbag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought one and the leg piece snapped off so I returned it but I really liked how small it was and the ability of the neck to fold down. I bought a second one and yet when I went to put my phone in the holder bent back and now when I close the tripod the lid doesn't fully close. I'm wanting to return this one but I don't know where the box is so I will call Amazon to see about getting a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No la usado aún así que no puedo calificar todo lo bien que de seguro funciona, pero las 5 🌟 es porque está muy bonita, se ve muy funcional, el tamaño es perfecto para la maleta o bolsa de mano, ya casi es el día de mis vacaciones así que volveré a compartir mi opinión. Pero por buen tamaño y linda la recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its so perfect for Disney & while traveling I love taking photos making memories so this is perfect!
